methods.description: This request returns the countries supported by the Dealer API

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The index of the page to be returned. If this parameter is omitted, the first page will be returned.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The index of the page to be returned. If this parameter is omitted, the first page will be returned.

responses.description: countries and navigation links for additional results.

methods.description: This request returns dealers (dealer, garage, retailer, etc.) for given parameters

parameters.name: dealerIds
parameters.description: Array of dealer ids. The dealer id is dealer’s business key, also known as GS Id. e.g. GS0000857,GS0017621

parameters.name: radiusValue
parameters.description: The radius value of the search area. The center of the search area is defined by geo coordinates. (latitude, longitude properties) If radiusValue and radiusUnit parameters are missing, then the default radius is 10 km.

parameters.name: radiusUnit
parameters.description: The radius unit of the search area. The center of the search area is defined by geo coordinates. (latitude, longitude properties) If radiusValue and radiusUnit parameters are missing, then the default radius is 10 km.

parameters.name: countryIsoCode
parameters.description: The country of the dealer address defined as ISO two letter ID (e.g. DE, CH, CN, etc.)

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: The city of the dealer address.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: A name of the dealer, the name filter will be applied to all Dealer names (e.g. legalName, nameAddition). You can also search for parts of Dealer names, e.g. the search term 'Niederlassung' will also match 'Niederlassung Stuttgart'.

parameters.name: brand
parameters.description:
Filter by brand, valid values are:
  * MB: Mercedes-Benz
  * SMT: Smart

parameters.name: activity
parameters.description:
Filter by activity, valid actitvity values are:
  * PARTS: Spare Parts Sales
  * SALES: Sales of new vehicles
  * SERVICE: Maintaining and repair
  * USED-VEHICLES-TRADE: Sales of used vehicles

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Specifies which fields should be included in the result. If this filter is not used, per default all fields are returned. e.g. fields=dealers(dealerId,address(street,city))

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The index of the page to be returned. If this parameter is omitted, the first page will be returned.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The index of the page to be returned. If this parameter is omitted, the first page will be returned.

methods.description: This request returns dealers for given parameters

parameters.name: dealerId
parameters.description: The dealer id is dealer’s business key, also known as GS Id. e.g. GS0000857

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Specifies which fields should be included in the result. If this filter is not used, per default all fields are returned. e.g. fields=dealerId,address(street,city)

apiDescription: The Dealer API provides Dealer search functions.
